revised_title: Predicting the Motion of the Second Comet
tldr: The author, Monsieur Auzout, predicts the motion of the second comet and shares his ephemerides for others to compare and verify. He hopes that accurate observations of the comet's changes will help answer the question of whether the Earth moves or not. Auzout also suggests that the comet may decline from its great circle towards the South, which could lead to important discoveries.
